control.description-key: Customizable file attachment control with drag-and-drop support

property.name: Files
property.description-key: JSON string containing uploaded file data

property.name: ClearFiles
property.description-key: Increment this number to clear all files (e.g., use a context variable and increment it)

property.name: ShowDocumentation
property.description-key: Set to true to display developer documentation overlay

property.name: stylePrimaryColorHex
property.description-key: Hex color for button and border

property.name: styleMainTextColor
property.description-key: Hex color for main text

property.name: styleButtonTextColor
property.description-key: Hex color for button text

property.name: styleBackgroundColorHex
property.description-key: Hex color for drop zone and header background

property.name: styleErrorColorHex
property.description-key: Hex color for error messages

property.name: styleBorderRadius
property.description-key: Border radius in pixels

property.name: styleBoxShadowSize
property.description-key: Box shadow offset in pixels (0 for no shadow)

property.name: styleGap
property.description-key: Gap between drop zone and file list in pixels

property.name: styleLayoutHorizontal
property.description-key: True for side-by-side layout, false for vertical stacked layout

property.name: styleFont
property.description-key: Font family name (e.g., Open Sans, Arial, Lato)

property.name: svgDropZone
property.description-key: Custom SVG for drop zone icon

property.name: svgEmptyFileList
property.description-key: Custom SVG for empty file list

property.name: svgTypeImage
property.description-key: Custom SVG for image files

property.name: svgTypeDoc
property.description-key: Custom SVG for document files

property.name: svgTypeOther
property.description-key: Custom SVG for other file types

property.name: svgDeleteIcon
property.description-key: Custom SVG for delete/remove button icon

property.name: settingMaxFileSizeMB
property.description-key: Maximum file size in megabytes

property.name: settingMaxNumberOfFiles
property.description-key: Maximum number of files allowed

property.name: settingAllowedFileTypes
property.description-key: Comma-separated list of allowed file extensions (e.g., .pdf,.jpg,.doc)

property.name: textBrowseButtonText
property.description-key: Text displayed on the browse button
